title: Neck Stretch
duration: Hold 30 sec per side per position
description: Gently tilt your head: ear to shoulder, chin to chest, then opposite shoulder. Hold each position until you feel a gentle stretch.

title: Shoulder Stretch (Behind Back)
description: Interlace fingers behind your back and raise your arms as high as comfortable. Targets shoulders, chest, and biceps.

title: Shoulder Stretch (Across Chest)
description: Extend one arm across your chest and use the other to press it closer to your body, stretching the rear delt and rotator cuff.

title: Tricep Stretch
description: Raise one arm overhead, bend the elbow, and use your other hand to gently pull the elbow toward the opposite side.

title: Hip & Psoas Stretch
description: Kneel with one knee down and the other foot forward, push hips forward and chest up to target the psoas. Optional: reach back to stretch quad.

title: Seated Glute Stretch
description: Sit or lie on your back, cross one ankle over the opposite knee, and gently pull the top knee toward your chest. Stretches glutes and hamstrings.

title: Hamstring Stretch
description: Sit with a straight spine and one leg extended, reach towards your toes while keeping your chest upright.

title: Calf Stretch
description: Place toes on an angled board (~70Â°) or step, heel down, leaning forward to stretch the calf muscle.
